TopicTitle: New Horror Short Film! The Lamplighter!

Articles.Content:
So, some of my good friends from school have made a short horror film call "The Lamplighter" with only about 150 views so far. I think that everyone on the forum would really appreciate the hard work put into this! Give these people some love and spread this around! 

WARNING! Horror themes and graphic images and language! (14+) Enjoy, nevertheless!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UEwRW2_BQ5U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

General discussion below.
